page.title: 06Christian Worship on Deeside
page.content: Christian worship on Deeside is practised in a variety of churches.One {Roman Catholic,}one{Church of England, One{Welsh Chapel,}and one{United {Reformed Church}.The Catholic church is called the Blessed Sacrement and is run by Fr. Keegan. at this church communion is served daily at mass. The Anglican church run by Rev.Roberts is called St Ethelwolds.{He is unusal, in {that he takes confessions which is {really a Catholic practise.}There are communion services held once on a Sunday and a Tuesday. It has 1,500 members. The Welsh Methodist church has a small permenant congregation of 7. It is run by the minister Rev.B.I. Williams ,communion is served one Sunday in five. The U.R.C. is similar to the Welsh chapel except it's services are in English.It has a membership of 1000.{Stephanie Gavin
